title: Enhancing Differentiated Instruction Design and Implementation Capabilities Through Collaborative Action Research

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic instructional methods and experience in lesson design
context.additional_context: Realistic classroom environment implementation via smartphone-based VR simulations. Blended online-offline activities for collaborative learning among participants

learning_goals: Participants can analyze student diversity in classrooms and design three or more differentiated strategies.
Learners can perform peer feedback routines with fellow teachers two or more times using the Community of Inquiry (CoI) methodology.
Learners can execute differentiated instruction in a VR simulation environment and write reflective journals for each process.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
